mapper.sql: select t.tno, t.titl, t.loc, t.star, t.cmt_cnt, t.amt, t.pri_phot, t.cat_no from tour t inner join ranking r on t.tno = r.tno
mapper.select: select t.tno, t.titl, l.locnm as locnm_ko, l.loc_eng as locnm_en, t.star, t.cmt_cnt, t.hits, t.amt, t.tour_intro, t.req_inf, t.reg_dt, t.mod_dt, t.join_plc, t.lat, t.lon, t.join_tm, t.del_yn, t.pri_phot, t.pri_mv, t.cat_no, t.mno from tour t, loc l where t.tno = #{value} and t.loc = l.loc
select m.name, m.email, m.photo, g.intro from memb m, g_memb g where m.mno = #{value} and m.mno = g.mno
select c.cr_name, c.cr_intro, p.cr_phot_name from course c, course_phot p where c.tno = #{value} and c.cr_no = p.cr_no order by cr_idx asc
select m.name, c.cont, c.cont_star, c.cont_phot, c.cont_dt from comment c, memb m where tno = #{value} and c.mno = m.mno and c.del_yn = 'N' order by cont_dt desc
